review_text: We purchased this unit originally for our own use, because our relatives had one of these always available happily for decades, but later, we shared this unit with a close family who needed it to help them with maintenance of newly refurbished wood flooring, and now that WE are writing this review, WE are reminded that WE really need to purchase another of these units in the not too distant future, hopefully still available from Amazon, when it comes time for us to make another purchase of it, because WE feel after years of family use, that this type of unit really is the BEST to use to clean and polish floors and make the job at hand the easiest possible, and the family we shared our other unit with, also voiced this same response to us as well. Blessings to you in all your floor maintenance adventures.
